data.title: Karen David Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Karen David on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Karen David including Fear the Walking Dead, Galavant, and more.
data.text:
Control

Officer Nolan's relationship with his first confidential informant is tested when he discovers her back on the street dealing drugs; Lucy's fear of dating following her abduction is beginning to threaten her friendship with Jackson.

300

When Reid and Garcia are abducted by Benjamin Merva (Michael Hogan), it's up to the rest of the team to find them. The BAU finds surprising clues in their own history to solve why the two heroes have been targeted by a mass murderer. It's a race to save them before a "Believers" prophecy is fulfilled.

Believer

When Reid discovers former FBI Special Agent Owen Quinn (James Urbaniak) locked inside a storage unit, the BAU questions the credibility of Quinn's bizarre accounts of searching for an UnSub that he named 'The Strangler'.
